column4: ﻿ Hey all. Trying to share a folder in Hardy by right-clicking, selecting share, but when I select all 3 checkboxes, I get a net usershare error 255: cannot open usershare directory /var/lib/usershares. My user is in the sambashares group, what's wrong here?
